name.en: Seminar on the Grammar of Hakka

department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家研究博士班
department.en: Ph.D. Program of Hakka Studies, Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 本課程旨在在對客家語語法作專題式的深入導讀，使學生對客家語的句式及基本結構有所認識，並透過比較，了解臺灣客家語的語法特色，以及客家語語法在漢語方言類型中的特色。
goal.en: This course is aimed to provide an in-depth introduction to the grammar of the Hakka language in a thematic manner. Students can understand the syntax and basic structure of the Hakka language and, through comparison, understand the grammatical features of the Taiwanese Hakka and the characteristics of Hakka grammar from a perspective of Sinitic dialectal typology.

outline.ch:
（一）導論
（二）構詞與語法
（三）古漢語形態變化
（四）體標記
（五）「同/摎/將」構式的功能及處置式相關問題
（六）雙賓、致使與被動的發展──「分」字構式的語法化
（七）動補結構
（八）差比句
（九）言說動詞「話」與「講」的語法化與詞彙化
（十）副詞及其語法化
（十一）情態系統
outline.en:
1.Introduction to the grammar of Hakka
2.Morphology and grammar
3.Reflections of Voicing/Devoicing Alternation and Tonal Alternation in Hakka
4.Aspect markers
5.Functions of the constructions with ‘TUNG/LAU/JIONG’ and some issues related to disposal constructions
6.Evolutions of double objects, causatives and passives—grammaticalization of constructions with ‘BUN’
7.The Verb-Complement constructions
8.The comparisons of inequality
9.Grammaticalization and lexicalization of verb of saying ‘va6’ and ‘gong3’
10.The adverbs and their grammaticalization
11.Modal system in Hakka
